mapper.select: SELECT md.code FROM user_matching_must_dimension um INNER JOIN matching_dimension md ON md.dimension_id = um.dimension_id WHERE um.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY md.display_order ASC

SELECT md.code, up.priority_order FROM user_matching_priority_dimension up INNER JOIN matching_dimension md ON md.dimension_id = up.dimension_id WHERE up.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY up.priority_order ASC
SELECT dimension_id AS dimensionId, priority_order AS priorityOrder FROM user_matching_priority_dimension WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY priority_order ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_matching_must_dimension (user_id, dimension_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{dimensionId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO user_matching_priority_dimension (user_id, dimension_id, priority_order, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{dimensionId}, #{priorityOrder}, NOW())
